sled noun [C]
(VEHICLE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
an object used for travelling over snow and ice with long, narrow strips of wood or metal under it instead of wheels. It can be either a low frame, or a vehicle like a carriage pulled by horses or dogs. Compare
sleigh
